nodes.text: A holocomm was a communication unit that could be found on starships. The Trandoshan bounty hunter Bossk's ship Hound's Tooth was equipped with a holocomm which beeped whenever he was contacted by hologram. The holocomm was connected to his hologram and communications console. Bossk used a holocomm while contacting local Imperial authorities on Lothal about a bounty on the Dug fugitive Gronson Takkaro.
